评论概述: Order this suit of clothing 2 sizes larger, because normally it is sized too small
评论详情: The Jacket is BEAUTIFUL! and It is made cheaply, but it looks GREAT! In my case when I received my set of clothing, they sent the Jacket, but the vest and pants were missing. Must have been an error in the warehouse. I contacted the seller and they were very professional and determined to find a solution or give compensation. Since I only received the Jacket, they gave me a $40.00 partial refund. I think that is really FAIR and GREAT on their part! So, the 5 stars is mostly for the integrity of the customer service person who assisted me. Top-Notch customer service! You can order fearlessly from "CloudStyle" because if there is a problem with your order, then you can bet your bottom dollar the customer service department will make it right!  SIZING, I have learned from other reviews that the garment is just too small. But, I wear a Medium, and I took a chance and ordered my suit in an Extra-Large, and this size fits me perfectly. So, try ordering your suit 2 sizes larger and it may be perfect for you too (God Willing).
